subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Goalie Cam Ward was perhaps the best player on the ice on Saturday night even though the Hurricanes lost to Edmonton on a disputed goal with 2 minutes 15 seconds left in the game.
snippet: Goalie Cam Ward was perhaps the best player on the ice on Saturday night even though the Hurricanes lost to Edmonton on a disputed goal with 2 minutes 15 seconds left in the game.
